title: Profissional Back End.Net/Python - SR
description:
Código da vaga: 47141


Sobre a BRQ Digital


Há 32 anos no mercado, a BRQ Digital Solutions se consolidou como uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país. Com uma plataforma de serviços end to end, oferecemos as mais eficientes e inovadoras soluções, tecnologias e metodologias, promovendo uma jornada de transformação para grandes marcas, de diferentes segmentos, no Brasil e no exterior.


Nossos 2.500 mil funcionários atuam no modelo de trabalho Anywhere Office e a empresa é destaque como um dos melhores lugares para trabalhar pelo GPTW e Glassdoor.


BRQ WAY


No nosso BRQ WAY temos a missão de conectar, transformar e empoderar cada um dos nossos profissionais, que por aqui são chamados de feras, para que todos tenham a chance de usar sua paixão para transformar o mundo com tecnologia!


É isso que queremos, com nosso Programa de Diversidade e Inclusão trabalhamos com dois objetivos: equidade e inclusão, buscamos aumentar a participação dos grupos minoritários, quebrar os vieses inconscientes e expandir a conscientização sobre temas tão importantes para que todos sejam livres para serem quem são.


Vamos transformar juntos! Vem ser fera com a gente.


  • Ei Profissional Back End .Net/Python - SR, chegou o momento de encarar um novo desafio em sua carreira! Venha ser um #ferabrq


- O que procuramos?


Buscamos um #fera com espírito empreendedor e que sabe que é o verdadeiro protagonista do seu sucesso! Queremos em nosso time pessoas motivadas por desafios, constante evolução e, claro, que são apaixonadas por tecnologia e transformação!


- O que você deve ter?


Habilidades Principais:

  • Linguagens: .NET Core, Python
  • Serviços AWS: ECS, API Gateway, Lambda, Terraform/CloudFormation, Glue, Step Functions, DynamoDB, Athena, SQS, SNS
  • Integração de Dados: Kafka, Data Mesh


- O que temos pra te oferecer?


Mais do que um plano de carreira !


A BRQ acredita que cada fera deve ser protagonista do seu crescimento, tendo autonomia para criar seu próprio plano de desenvolvimento profissional. Nosso plano de carreira é dividido em 4 pilares:


Carreira técnica: Você pode seguir a trilha de crescimento técnico, se o seu objetivo for se desenvolver cada vez mais em diferentes tecnologias. Oferecemos diversos treinamentos!


Carreira de Liderança: Você pode seguir a trilha e se tornar um líder, desenvolver pessoas, auxiliar na evolução profissional e pessoal e estimular o crescimento para o surgimento de novos talentos.


Experiência internacional: Estamos crescendo cada vez mais fora do Brasil e você tem possibilidade de atuar em projetos para outros países, ou diretamente nos países onde a BRQ tem sede.


Empreendedorismo: De funcionário para sócio! Temos o Innovation Hub, a Corporate Venture que investe em ideias de profissionais que tenham sinergia com nosso negócio.


- E os benefícios?


Plano de Saúde; Plano Odontológico; Seguro de Vida; Vale Refeição; Vale Alimentação; Horário Flexível; Atuação híbrida; Gympass, Telemedicina, Telenutrição, Canal de suporte emocional 24h e muito mais!


- Como é trabalhar na BRQ?


Temos um clima descontraído, diversos programas e eventos internos. Adoramos comemorar! E fazemos isso muito bem! Veja aqui no Youtube: youtube.com/brqdigitalsolutions


Curtiu? Então inscreva-se e venha para o melhor da Transformação Digital com a gente!

title: Analista de requisitos
description:
Analista de Requisitos de Software - Pleno


O perfil Analista de Requisitos atua na identificação, definição e documentação de processos de negócios e de requisitos de software. Ele busca assegurar uma ligação consistente entre a equipe de negócio e a equipe técnica, facilitando a comunicação e auxiliando no aprofundamento do domínio do negócio, objeto da implementação.


O Analista de Requisitos também atua na propositura de funcionalidades e na organização das informações, bem como na definição do comportamento e fluxo do processo da aplicação, satisfazendo às necessidades de negócio declaradas e não declaradas.


Principais responsabilidades:

- Colaborar ativamente com gestores para identificar, manter e validar requisitos, contribuindo para que as expectativas do cliente sejam entendidas e traduzidas em histórias de usuário claras e concisas.

- Desenvolver uma compreensão profunda do ecossistema de negócios, propondo melhorias nos processos existentes e novas funcionalidades que impulsionem a criação de valor para o usuário final.

- Atuar em conjunto com os times de tecnologia e negócio.

- Gerenciar, fatiar, descartar e priorizar o backlog do produto – em apoio ao gestor de negócio.

- Contribuir para a definição dos critérios de aceitação de histórias de usuários, em conjunto com o gestor e a equipe de desenvolvimento.

- Conduzir a homologação das entregas com o gestor de negócio.

- Apoiar os usuários quanto à utilização e criação/atualização de manuais e documentação de produtos.


Formação

Curso superior completo na área de Tecnologia da Informação ou formação de nível superior em qualquer área de conhecimento, com pós-graduação na área de Tecnologia da Informação com duração mínima de 360 (trezentos e sessenta) horas.


Experiência / Qualificação

- Experiência comprovada em atividades de engenharia de software, especificamente no desenvolvimento de produtos por meio de metodologia SCRUM ou similar.

- Habilidades de organização, iniciativa e independência.

- Capacidade analítica e de julgamento, além de habilidades em liderança e gestão de pessoas.

- Conhecimento em UML.

- Conhecimento em prototipação.

- Conhecimento em linguagem Markdown.

- Experiência na utilização de ferramentas de controle de versão.

title: Analista de Comunicação Interna Pleno
description:
About the company:

Avenue Code is the leading software consultancy focused on delivering end-to-end development solutions for digital transformation across every vertical. We’re privately held, profitable, and have been on a solid growth trajectory since day one. We care deeply about our clients, our partners, and our people. We prefer the word ‘partner’ over ‘vendor’, and our investment in professional relationships is a reflection of that philosophy. We pride ourselves on our technical acumen, our collaborative problem-solving ability, and the warm professionalism of our teams.

Avenue Code has been believing in and promoting plurality actions for over 10 years, understanding that recognizing differences and fostering a safe environment, employment opportunities, representation, and support are the best ways to promote an increasingly equitable culture.


About the opportunity:

You will be part of the communication team at the AI/R group, where Avenue is one of the group’s companies. You will work cross-functionally across all group companies, ensuring alignment in communication and culture.


Responsibilities:

  • Plan, develop, and execute internal communication campaigns that are aligned with the company’s strategic objectives, ensuring engagement and clarity across the organization.
  • Produce high-quality institutional content for various communication channels, including but not limited to emails, intranet, corporate TV, newsletters, and others, tailored to the needs of different internal audiences.
  • Organize and execute internal events and engagement activities, fostering a positive work environment and promoting employee connection with company goals and values.
  • Act as a communication consultant to strategic departments, providing support for communication needs in specific projects and initiatives across the organization.
  • Develop, track, and analyze internal communication KPIs to measure campaign effectiveness. Proactively suggest improvements and adjustments to enhance internal communication efforts continuously.
  • Ensure that internal communications reinforce and promote the company’s culture and values, helping employees feel aligned with the organization’s mission and vision.


Required Qualifications:

  • Proven experience in internal communications.
  • Strong writing and editing skills, with the ability to tailor content to different audiences.
  • Experience in planning and executing internal campaigns and events.
  • Familiarity with communication tools (e.g., email marketing, intranet platforms, TV corporate systems).
  • Ability to collaborate effectively with multiple departments and leaders.
  • Advanced English skills (writing and speaking).



Avenue Code reinforces its commitment to privacy and to all the principles guaranteed by the most accurate global data protection laws, such as GDPR, LGPD, CCPA and CPRA. The Candidate data shared with Avenue Code will be kept confidential and will not be transmitted to disinterested third parties, nor will it be used for purposes other than the application for open positions. As a Consultancy company, Avenue Code may share your information with its clients and other Companies from the CompassUol Group to which Avenue Code’s consultants are allocated to perform its services.

title: Senior Backend (LLM) Engineer
description:
About Us

Founded in 2019 by two best friends, Jon and Eli, XILO set out to revolutionize the insurance industry by solving its biggest challenges. Eli, a brokerage owner, brought invaluable industry expertise, while Jon, an experienced software engineer, saw an opportunity to innovate using technology. Initially launched as a vertical SaaS solution addressing core quoting challenges, XILO has since evolved into a trailblazing Vertical AI company leveraging the latest AI technology to transform the industry. By layering cutting-edge AI solutions onto its SaaS platform, XILO is driving innovation far beyond its original vision. Having recently closed our Series A funding round, XILO is growing rapidly and seeking talented individuals who want to do career-defining work in a mission-driven startup that’s at the forefront of AI innovation.


About The Role

You’ll be designing and optimizing AI models, fine-tuning LLMs, OCR, and other AI-driven systems to streamline complex workflows and make insurance automation smarter, faster, and more reliable.

This isn’t just another ML role. We’re solving deep-rooted inefficiencies that insurance agencies have struggled with for decades—so much so that prospects have nearly teared up realizing how much time and effort our solutions will save them. Your work won’t be theoretical—it will directly transform the way thousands of businesses operate.


What You’ll Do:

  • Architect and develop scalable TypeScript microservices powering XILO’s platform.
  • Design and optimize workflows for AI-driven customer interactions with the help of integration and fine tuning LLMs.
  • Prepare datasets for LLM fine-tuning.
  • Optimize system performance, reliability, and scalability.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams (product, frontend, data science) to deliver seamless integrations.
  • Mentor and guide junior engineers, fostering a collaborative and growth-oriented team culture.
  • Implement best practices for API security, data privacy, and maintainability.


What we’re looking for

  • 7+ years of backend engineering experience, with at least 2 years of expertise in TypeScript/Node.js.
  • Deep understanding of microservices architecture and cloud-based deployment (AWS, Heroku).
  • Deep understanding of Postgres database architecture and design.
  • Proven experience with scalable API design and database optimization.
  • Experience in fine-tuning and integration with LLMs (ChatGPT, ClaudeAI, Llama, etc.)
  • Experience in gathering datasets for LLM fine-tuning.
  • Passion for writing clean, maintainable, and testable code.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced startup environment.
  • A collaborative mindset with a willingness to mentor and learn from others.


What we offer

  • Collaborative and innovative work environment.
  • Flex PTO for any reason, including sick days (no specified limits), flexible work schedule.
  • Personal laptop.
  • Health and wellness package.
  • Budget for English lessons.


You’ll have the opportunity to specialize in:

  • AI Agents – The core of our automation strategy, building AI-driven workflows that replace tedious, manual processes with seamless decision-making
  • LLM & Model Fine-Tuning – Adapting models to understand and process insurance-specific language and workflows with high accuracy
  • OCR & Document Intelligence – Extracting, structuring, and analyzing critical insights from a wide range of insurance documents
  • Intelligent Data Mapping – Training models to aggregate, categorize, and link scattered data into a centralized, dynamic user profile


Why Join XILO?

  • A great tech startup – Small, fast-moving, and driven by real impact
  • Endless career growth – Help shape the team, tech, and company as we scale
  • Strong leadership & backing – Work alongside experienced founders and tier 1 silicon-valley VCs
  • Real-world data at scale – Work with rich, high-quality datasets collected from hundreds of insurance agencies , providing a strong foundation for AI fine- tuning, automation, and decision-making models

title: Entry Level Recruiter (Dutch Speaker)
description:
We are looking for a passionate and motivated Entry Level Recruiter to support our recruitment efforts in the Netherlands market.

Mandatory Requirement: Fluency in Dutch and English

This is going to be 100% remote job and we are only considering PJ.

Responsibilities:

Source and screen candidates for various roles.

Conduct initial interviews and assessments.

Coordinate and schedule interviews with hiring managers.

Assist in developing and posting job advertisements.

Maintain candidate databases and track recruitment metrics.

Provide excellent candidate experience throughout the recruitment process.

Requirements:

Fluency in Dutch and English (both written and spoken).

Strong communication and interpersonal skills.

Ability to multitask and manage time effectively.

Keen interest in the recruitment and talent acquisition field.

Basic knowledge of recruitment tools and techniques is a plus.

title: Senior SAP Consultant
description:
Buscamos um Consultor SAP BTP Sênior para integrar um projeto estratégico de transformação digital no setor de varejo.


Responsabilidades:

  • Projetar e implementar soluções na SAP Business Technology Platform (SAP BTP) .
  • Trabalhar com serviços como SAP Integration Suite, SAP Extension Suite , SAP Build , SAP Business Application Studio , entre outros.
  • Desenvolvimento de integrações entre SAP S/4HANA Cloud, sistemas legados e aplicativos de terceiros.
  • Criação de extensões (side-by-side extensions) para o SAP S/4HANA Cloud usando serviços BTP.
  • Apoiar a configuração de workflows , automação de processos e gestão de APIs .
  • Conduzir workshops técnicos e treinar usuários-chave sobre as funcionalidades da SAP BTP.


Requisitos:

  • Experiência mínima de 5 anos em projetos SAP, sendo pelo menos 2 anos específicos em SAP BTP .
  • Forte conhecimento em desenvolvimento de integrações via SAP Integration Suite e APIs REST/SOAP.
  • Experiência com desenvolvimento de extensões Fiori/UI5 em ambiente SAP BTP.
  • Conhecimento em autenticação e autorização na BTP (XSUAA, OAuth).
  • Experiência prática com serviços de automação como SAP Build Process Automation ou SAP Workflow Management .


Localização: Brasil (preferencialmente em São Paulo)

Modalidade: Flexível

Tipo de projeto: Migração

Idioma requerido: Português (fluente), outros idiomas serão um diferencial


Interessados enviar e-mail para com sua taxa (rate) ou aplicar diretamente .

title: [MKT-On-site] Marketing Manager - São Paulo, Brazil
description:
Job Summary: We are seeking a creative and data-driven Marketing Manager to develop and implement effective marketing strategies for BIWIN Storage's product portfolio. The ideal candidate will have experience in B2B and B2C marketing within the technology sector. This role is crucial for increasing brand awareness, generating leads, and supporting our sales growth objectives.




Key Responsibilities:


Marketing Strategy:


Develop comprehensive marketing plans aligned with company objectives


Create and manage marketing budgets to ensure optimal resource allocation


Brand Management:


Maintain brand consistency across all marketing channels and materials


Develop and enhance brand positioning in the storage solutions market


Digital Marketing:


Oversee website content, SEO/SEM strategies, and social media presence


Manage email marketing campaigns and lead nurturing programs


Content Creation:


Direct the development of marketing collateral including product sheets, case studies, and white papers


Ensure all content effectively communicates product benefits and value propositions


Campaign Management:


Plan and execute integrated marketing campaigns across multiple channels


Measure campaign performance and optimize based on analytics


Event Coordination:


Organize company participation in trade shows, exhibitions, and industry events


Plan and manage product launch events and webinars


Market Research:


Analyze market trends, customer needs, and competitor activities


Use insights to inform marketing strategies and identify new opportunities


Team Leadership:


Manage marketing team members or external agencies

title: Social Worker
description:
**This job is in Ireland - you must be fluent in English - we can only accept applications from fully qualified social workers who are willing to relocate to Ireland - we will coordinate all visas, work permits etc**


GS International Recruitment is looking for a highly skilled and experienced Social Care Worker who will work with children/ young people, families and/ or significant others, Social Work teams, other healthcare providers agencies, schools, training agencies and community groups.


The Social Care Worker will care for, protect, and support vulnerable or dependent clients, individually or in groups, in conjunction with the wider multidisciplinary team and other relevant agencies. She/ he will ensure the welfare of those under his/ her care and will act as an advocate as appropriate.


The Social Care Worker will contribute to the planning and evaluation of individualised and group programmes of care, which are based on needs, identified in consultation with the client and others and delivered through day-to-day shared life experiences.


Within the Residential and Special Care Setting , the Social Care Worker will work as part of a team to provide a safe, caring environment for resident children/ young people with the primary aim of providing the intervention necessary to address the issues that are preventing them from living at home or in foster care, or to prepare them to live independently with the support of aftercare services.


Key Responsibilities:


Care and Support:

  • Ability to treat children/young people and their families with dignity, respect, and unconditional positive regard.
  • Plan, implement, and evaluate care plans, placement plans, and treatment programs.
  • Incorporate understanding of how previous life experiences impact children/young people into practice.
  • Engage in crisis management and physical intervention as per policy (e.g., Therapeutic Crisis Intervention).


Family and Community Engagement:

  • Work collaboratively with parents, families, and other agencies on behalf of the child/young person.
  • Participate in meetings regarding the care and development of children/young people.
  • Provide verbal and written feedback on the progress of children/young people.


Supportive and Advocacy:

  • Promote the rights, responsibilities, and welfare (physical, emotional, social, cultural, ethnic, spiritual) of each child/young person.
  • Encourage and support children/young people in community and family settings.
  • Form relationships and engage with traumatized children/young people.
  • Be a positive role model and advocate for children/young people's well-being.


Organizational and Management:

  • Undertake home management tasks such as budgeting, upkeep, cleaning, and hygiene.
  • Organize personal documents, information, and finances on behalf of children/young people.
  • Arrange age-appropriate activities and ensure the safety and risk assessment of children/young people on-site and during outings.


Educational and Developmental Support:

  • Promote attendance at school, training centers, medical, and clinical appointments.
  • Engage in age-appropriate play and activities with children/young persons.
  • Assist with transfer/referral to other services as needed.


Safety and Crisis Management:

  • Supervise children/young people during outings and maintain safety protocols.
  • Remain calm and manage oneself during volatile or potentially violent situations.
  • Report and respond to incidents promptly, including cases of absconding or abuse prevention.

The above Job Description is not intended to be a comprehensive list of all duties involved and consequently, the post holder may be required to perform other duties as appropriate to the post which may be assigned to him/her from time to time and to contribute to the development of the post while in office.

Must be willing to relocate to Ireland



Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Social Work, Psychology, Sociology, or related field (preferred).
  • More than 5 years of experience working in a residential care setting or with children and young people in a supportive capacity.
  • Knowledge of child development, trauma-informed care, and therapeutic interventions.
  • Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to build rapport and trust with residents and their families.
  • Ability to work effectively within a multidisciplinary team and collaborate with external agencies.
  • Commitment to safeguarding and promoting the welfare of children and young people.


Alternatively, please contact Rendy Mfene at if you have any questions!

title: Chatbot Engineer
description:
The Chatbot Engineer at Avenue Code will focus on developing and configuring conversational flows within the Google Dialogflow platform. They will be responsible for designing and implementing intents, entities, context management, and the overall dialogue logic to guide the end user. This role involves setting up webhook calls from Dialogflow to integration points (such as Cloud Functions) that will execute the business logic. The engineer will work closely with the Node.js Engineer to define and validate the interfaces/contracts for these integrations.


Essential Skills:

  • Hands-on experience in developing and configuring conversational flows in commercial platforms, with a strong preference for Google Dialogflow.
  • Deep knowledge of conversational design: intents, entities, context management, fallback handling, and response strategies.
  • Experience configuring webhook calls from Dialogflow to external services.
  • Ability to map business requirements into effective dialogue flows.
  • Capability to collaborate with back-end engineers to define API/integration contracts.


Desirable Skills:

  • Basic programming knowledge (e.g., Node.js, Python) to understand webhook logic.
  • Experience with messaging platforms, especially WhatsApp Business API.
  • Familiarity with Natural Language Processing (NLP) concepts.
  • Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP).
  • Knowledge of version control tools like Git.

title: ServiceNow Support Analyst
description:
Job Title: ServiceNow Support Analyst

Employment Type: Contract

Compensation (average salary in Brazilian currency):

  • Junior Level: R$ 78-89/h (0–2 years of experience)
  • Mid Level: R$ 89-101/h (3–5 years of experience)
  • Senior Level: R$ 112-123/h (5+ years of experience)

Location: Remote


Overview

Our cliente is seeking a detail-oriented and service-driven ServiceNow Support Analyst . In this role, you will be responsible for delivering high-quality technical and functional support for the ServiceNow platform. You will serve as a frontline contact for end users, troubleshoot platform-related issues, and help maintain and enhance the system’s performance and usability. This is an excellent opportunity for professionals passionate about ITSM tools and customer support to contribute meaningfully in a dynamic and collaborative environment.


Key Responsibilities

  • Act as the primary point of contact for ServiceNow-related inquiries, incidents, and service requests.
  • Provide support through various channels including phone, email, and service portals, ensuring timely and accurate issue resolution.
  • Troubleshoot technical issues within ServiceNow, perform root cause analysis, and escalate when necessary.
  • Assist users with ServiceNow navigation, features, and capabilities; provide training and guidance as needed.
  • Execute basic administrative and configuration tasks such as user provisioning, password resets, and data updates under the guidance of senior staff.
  • Monitor system performance and proactively identify potential issues or bottlenecks.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional IT teams to implement system updates, bug fixes, and enhancements.
  • Participate in testing of new features and updates prior to deployment.
  • Maintain accurate documentation, including support guides, troubleshooting steps, and FAQs.
  • Support change, incident, and problem management processes in alignment with ITIL practices.
  • Contribute to continuous improvement initiatives to optimize the ServiceNow environment and user experience.
  • Stay informed on new ServiceNow releases and best practices to ensure up-to-date support and advice.


Qualifications

  • 0–2 years (Jr), 3–5 years (Mid), or 5+ years (Sr) of hands-on experience supporting ServiceNow or similar ITSM platforms.
  • Familiarity with ServiceNow modules such as Incident Management, Request Management, Knowledge Base, and User Administration.
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Excellent communication and customer service abilities.
  • Ability to work independently and in a collaborative team environment.
  • Exposure to ITIL framework and best practices preferred.
  • ServiceNow certifications (e.g., CSA) are a plus.

title: Desenvolvedor Backend Java Pleno
description:
Como será o seu dia a dia

  • Será um diferencial experiência com, Mensagerias (Kafka, RabbitMQ); Metodologias ágeis; Desenvolvimento baseado em TDD, BDD; Criação de testes de integração e testes de carga; Uso de containers com Docker; Kubernetes;

Adotamos o modelo 100% remoto, proporcionando flexibilidade, enquanto mantém a interação virtual com a equipe para garantir uma colaboração eficaz e um ambiente de crescimento contínuo.


‘’Se você busca um ambiente de crescimento e desafios, Vem ser feliz’’!

title: Lead Engineer – Retail POS Platforms
description:
Position: Lead Engineer – Retail POS Platforms

Location: Remote – Brazil, Colombia, Argentina, Mexico


We are looking for a highly skilled Lead Engineer with deep experience in developing and scaling point-of-sale (POS) solutions. You will drive the design and development of secure, robust, and high-performance retail applications across web and mobile platforms. This is a remote opportunity with a focus on Latin American talent.


Responsibilities:
  • Lead the design and development of new POS solutions within a modern retail platform.
  • Architect scalable, performant systems using a mix of technologies (React, Node.js, .NET, Flutter/Dart, PostgreSQL, GCP).
  • Heavily utilize AI tools to boost development efficiency and initial code quality.
  • Collaborate across teams including product, QA, services, and support.
  • Perform rigorous testing and debugging to ensure seamless updates and deployments.
  • Stay current on emerging technologies, retail trends, and development tools.
Requirements:
  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science or Software Engineering.
  • 5+ years of hands-on development experience, including architecture of distributed web systems.
  • Proven expertise in at least two of the following: React, Node.js, .NET, Flutter/Dart, PostgreSQL .
  • Retail industry experience, especially in point-of-sale environments , is a strong plus.
  • Solid knowledge of Git, Visual Studio, VS Code, AI coding assistants, and Agile collaboration tools like JIRA and Confluence.
  • Strong problem-solving, communication, and mentoring skills.
  • Ability to work independently with a collaborative, team-first mindset.

title: Senior Video Editor
description:
Job Title:

Senior Video Editor (with Graphic Design Skills) – Remote (Europe)


Company:

Falcon Funded


Location:

Remote (open to candidates across Europe)


⸻


About Us


At Falcon Funded , we help traders unlock their full potential. Our mission is to empower disciplined, consistent individuals with the capital, tools, and structure they need to succeed in the financial markets. We’re not just a funding platform — we’re building a brand that inspires, educates, and visually engages a global trading community.


We’re now looking to elevate our content even further with the right creative mind.


⸻


What We’re Looking For


We’re hiring a Senior Video Editor who lives and breathes visual storytelling. This isn’t just a cut-and-paste editing role — we want someone who can shape a narrative, match energy with sound and pacing, and bring bold, modern ideas to the table.


Bonus points if you’ve also got graphic design skills — think YouTube thumbnails, social media assets, ads, and digital branding.


⸻


Key Responsibilities

• Edit high-quality, engaging videos for YouTube, social media, ads, and internal content.

• Create visually striking intros, transitions, and animations.

• Work closely with our marketing and content teams to develop a consistent visual style.

• Repurpose long-form content into short-form, high-impact videos (e.g. reels, TikToks).

• Design clean, on-brand graphic assets (thumbnails, banners, posts, infographics, etc.).

• Manage and organize media assets and project files efficiently.


⸻


Must-Have Skills

• 4+ years of experience in video editing (Premiere Pro, Final Cut, or similar).

• Strong sense of pacing, visual storytelling, and rhythm.

• Experience with basic motion graphics (After Effects or equivalent).

• Solid portfolio of video content (please provide links).

• Proficiency in graphic design tools (Photoshop, Illustrator, Canva, or Figma).

• Ability to follow a brand style guide while adding creative flair.

• Good English communication skills and a self-driven attitude.


⸻


Nice-to-Have Skills

• Experience editing for a finance or trading-related brand.

• Knowledge of YouTube algorithm and video performance tactics.

• Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.


⸻


What We Offer

• Remote-first position with flexible hours.

• Opportunity to shape the visual voice of a fast-growing brand.

• Long-term collaboration with growth opportunities.

• A creative and energetic team that values quality and innovation.

• Competitive compensation based on experience and location.


⸻


Apply Now


If you’re a visual storyteller who’s passionate about editing and design — and you’re ready to leave your mark on a brand that’s going places — we want to hear from you.

title: Web3 Product Manager
description:
ABOUT THE CLIENT

Our client is a major blockchain-based platform specializing in decentralized finance (DeFi) solutions. They have gained recognition for their innovative approach to optimizing and facilitating decentralized cryptocurrency trading and liquidity aggregation:


JOB SUMMARY

We are looking for an experienced Product Manager with a strong understanding of Web3 technologies and blockchain development. In this role, you will be instrumental in shaping the product strategy and execution of decentralized applications and smart contract-based solutions. You will work closely with engineering, marketing, and business teams to build and scale innovative DeFi products.


KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Define and drive the product roadmap for decentralized applications (dApps) and blockchain-based solutions
  • Collaborate with engineering teams to design, develop, and optimize smart contract-driven products
  • Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify opportunities in the Web3 ecosystem
  • Work with stakeholders to translate business needs into product features and technical requirements
  • Ensure the security, scalability, and efficiency of blockchain-based applications
  • Stay updated on the latest Web3, blockchain, and DeFi trends to drive innovation


REQUIREMENTS

  • Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science, Engineering, Business, or a related field
  • 2+ years of experience in product management, preferably in Web3, DeFi, or blockchain-based solutions
  • Strong understanding of blockchain technology, smart contracts, and Web3 stack
  • Familiarity with Ethereum, Solidity, and other blockchain platforms
  • Experience working with cross-functional teams, including engineers, designers, and marketers
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to drive data-informed product decisions
  • Passion for decentralization, blockchain technology, and Web3 innovation


WHAT WE OFFER

  • Competitive salary & benefits package
  • Opportunity to work at the forefront of Web3 innovation
  • Flexible remote work arrangement
  • Professional growth and learning opportunities in the blockchain space

title: Pessoa executivo comercial - Banco de Talentos - Mercado Pago - Campo Grande
description:
No Mercado Livre estamos democratizando o comércio e o dinheiro para transformar a vida das pessoas na América Latina.

Nosso negócio Fintech oferece para toda a região uma proposta de valor integral, que visa democratizar os serviços financeiros e satisfazer as necessidades de mais de 60 milhões de usuários e usuárias.

Disponibilizamos uma plataforma online que permite receber pelas vendas eletrônicas realizadas, tanto dentro como fora do Mercado Livre, e um sistema de códigos QR e dispositivos Point para as vendas realizadas no mundo físico.

Para milhões de comerciantes, empreendedores e profissionais, damos a possibilidade de processar suas operações com segurança, através de mais de 50 meios de pagamento na América Latina.

Além disso, fornecemos acesso gratuito a uma conta digital que permite pagar, enviar e receber dinheiro, gerar renda e trabalhar com cartões para fazer compras ou saques.

Através do Mercado Crédito, concedemos créditos para satisfazer as necessidades daqueles a quem prestamos nossos serviços e potencializar os negócios de quem vende através da nossa plataforma.

Temos um desafio para as pessoas que:

  • Vibram energia empreendedora: são movidas pela curiosidade, nunca desistem e estão focadas em superar seus próprios limites.
  • Dão o máximo, porque adoram trabalhar com compromisso e dedicação.
  • Encaram as mudanças como oportunidades e aprendem com seus erros.
  • A excelência e a execução são primordiais na sua forma de fazer as coisas.
  • Promovem o bom clima, a alegria e a diversão.
  • Sabem como construir com outras pessoas e desfrutam trabalhando em equipe.


Imagine você empreendendo projetos desafiadores, dinâmicos e inovadores, e sendo responsável por:

  • Percorrer sua região, buscando identificar oportunidades de negócios e realizando uma oferta consultiva dos produtos e serviços do ecossistema do Mercado Livre.
  • Realizar o planejamento do seu dia a dia, frente às suas metas e junto à liderança, participando de reuniões diárias.
  • Garantir que, de acordo com os produtos ativos em cada estabelecimento, a equipe esteja treinada e o ponto físico devidamente positivado para o marketing comercial.
  • Atender as ocorrências de atendimentos demandados pelo HUB Digital e o Farming, garantindo sempre uma pós-venda impecável.
  • Identificar as ações locais da concorrência.


Requisitos:

  • Possuir formação superior completa ou estar cursando.
  • Ter Veículo Próprio
  • Ter experiência consistente de vendas em empresas adquirentes ou de entregas porta a porta.
  • Estar disponível para trabalhar na região.


Nós lhe propomos:

  • Ser parte de uma empresa com espírito empreendedor, na qual adoramos pensar grande e em longo prazo.
  • Ser protagonista de seu desenvolvimento em um ambiente de oportunidades, aprendizagem, crescimento, expansão e projetos desafiadores.
  • Compartilhar e aprender em equipe, com excelentes profissionais e especialistas.
  • Um excelente clima de trabalho, com todo o necessário para você viver uma grande experiência. :)

O Mercado Livre não faz contato oferecendo oportunidades em troca de pagamento de dinheiro. Você tem acesso a todas as oportunidades abertas no nosso site de carreiras. Caso receba pedidos de dinheiro, desconfie!

title: Personalized Internet Assessor (Portuguese Speaker)
description:
Looking for a freelance opportunity where you can make an impact on technology from the comfort of your home? If you are dynamic, tech-savvy, and always online to learn more, this part-time, flexible project is the perfect fit for you!


A Day in the Life of a Personalized Internet Assessor:

  • In this role, you’ll be analyzing and providing feedback on texts, pages, images, and other types of information for top search engines, using an online tool
  • Through reviewing and rating search results for relevance and quality, you’ll be helping to improve the overall user experience for millions of search engine users, including yourself.


Join our team today and start putting your skills to work for one of the world's leading search engines.


The estimated hourly earnings for this role are 5.00 USD per hour. Payment is based on completed tasks, with the potential for higher earnings based on productivity.


TELUS Digital AI Community

Our global AI Community is a vibrant network of 1 million+ contributors from diverse backgrounds who help our customers collect, enhance, train, translate, and localize content to build better AI models. Become part of our growing community and make an impact supporting the machine learning models of some of the world’s largest brands.


Qualification path


No previous professional experience is required to apply to this role, however, working on this project will require you to pass the basic requirements and go through a standard assessment process. This is a part-time long-term project and your work will be subject to our standard quality assurance checks during the term of this agreement.


Basic Requirements

  • Working as a freelancer with excellent communication skills in Portuguese
  • Being a resident in Brazil for the last 5 consecutive years and having familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media, and cultural affairs in Brazil
  • Active use of Gmail, Google+, and other forms of social media and experience in the use of web browsers to navigate and interact with a variety of content
  • Daily access to a broadband internet connection, a smartphone (Android 5.0, iOS 14 or higher), and a personal computer to work on.


Assessment

In order to be hired into the program, you’ll take a language assessment and an open book qualification exam that will determine your suitability for the position and complete ID verification. Don’t worry, our team will provide you with guidelines and learning materials before your exam. You will be required to complete the exam in a specific timeframe but at your convenience!


Equal Opportunity

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for a contractual relationship without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or protected veteran status. At TELUS Digital AI, we are proud to offer equal opportunities and are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive community. All aspects of selection are based on applicants’ qualifications, merits, competence, and performance without regard to any characteristic related to diversity.

title: Arquiteto Oracle EBS
description:
Venha para uma das maiores empresas de Serviços IT do mundo!! Aqui você pode transformar sua carreira!


Por que fazer parte da TCS? Aqui na TCS acreditamos que as pessoas fazem a diferença, por isso vivemos uma cultura de aprendizado ilimitado cheio de oportunidades de melhorias e desenvolvimento mútuo. O cenário ideal para expandir ideias através das ferramentas certas, contribuindo para nosso sucesso num ambiente colaborativo.


Procuramos Arquiteto Oracle EBS que queira aprender e transformar sua carreira.


Nesta função você irá:

Trabalhar com diferentes stakeholders para escrever e detalhar requerimentos do projeto;

Trabalhar em diferentes projetos ao mesmo tempo;

Elaborar desenhos de solução baseados nos requerimentos e defendê-los com diferentes times (locais e globais);

Traduzir requerimentos funcionais em requerimentos técnicos;

Apoiar o time de desenvolvimento nas soluções técnicas;

Apoio nos testes e resolução de eventuais defeitos nas diferentes fases do projeto, incluindo pós-go-live;


Temos alguns requisitos:

Conhecimento funcional dos módulos do Oracle EBS e boas práticas de mercado;

Bons conhecimentos em SLA Receivables;

Boas noções sobre desenvolvimento para Oracle EBS, especificamente em Order to Cash;

Participação em implementações e atualizações do Oracle EBS;

Conhecimento de diferentes frentes de negócio, como logística, cadeia de suprimentos, finanças, custos, entre outros;

Noções de boas práticas em gestão de projetos (PMBOK, Scrum, metodologias ágeis, etc.);

Todos os serviços deverão ser prestados pelo fornecedor de acordo com os protocolos de governança e políticas internas da empresa, sem prejuízo das demais disposições do contrato.

title: Head of Marketing (Performance)
description:
We’re revolutionizing the online betting landscape across Latin America and beyond. As a fast-growing, data-driven company, we combine cutting-edge technology with a passion for innovation. Operating in Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Peru, Mexico, and Canada — with aggressive expansion plans ahead — we are setting a new standard in online gaming.

We’re looking for bold, ambitious leaders ready to create lasting impact in a high-growth, entrepreneurial environment.


What You'll Be Doing

As Head of Performance Marketing , you will own and lead our acquisition engine. This is a high-impact leadership role with direct exposure to the executive team. You will be responsible for building a highly sophisticated performance marketing strategy powered by data, automation, and AI — tailored for the nuances of regulated and emerging markets.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Define and execute a performance marketing roadmap across multiple channels and countries, optimizing for ROI, LTV, and CPA.
  • Lead digital acquisition strategy across Google Ads, Meta, TikTok, WhatsApp, and new-gen platforms like Twitch and Kick.com.
  • Own the paid media P&L, aligning investment with business growth objectives.
  • Apply AI/ML tools for real-time optimization, personalized targeting, and creative automation.
  • Build advanced tracking and attribution models using tools like GA4, Segment, GTM, Adjust, or AppsFlyer.
  • Integrate acquisition strategy with CRM, content, and product teams to optimize the entire customer journey from awareness to retention.
  • Stay ahead of regulatory and compliance requirements in online betting markets, adapting campaigns accordingly.
  • Lead and scale a regional performance marketing team, fostering a high-performance, data-first culture.
  • Collaborate closely with Data Science and Engineering teams to ensure measurement accuracy and campaign impact.
  • Identify and test new channels, ad formats, tools, and trends to stay on the cutting edge of digital acquisition.


What We’re Looking For

  • 10+ years of experience in digital performance marketing, including at least 5 years in online betting, gaming, fintech, or other regulated industries.
  • Proven track record of managing multi-million dollar ad budgets with strong results in ROAS, CAC, LTV, and retention.
  • Expertise in paid media platforms: Google Ads, Meta Advantage+, TikTok Ads, X Ads, and WhatsApp Business.
  • Hands-on experience with MMPs (Adjust, AppsFlyer), tracking systems (GA4, GTM, Segment), and fraud prevention tools.
  • Strong knowledge of CRM strategy and integrating acquisition with lifecycle marketing.
  • Fluency in interpreting performance metrics and cohort data to drive real-time decision making.
  • Demonstrated ability to lead cross-functional teams and manage performance marketing at scale across multiple regions.
  • Deep understanding of LATAM consumer behavior, marketing regulations, and platform trends.
  • Fluent in Spanish and English. Portuguese is a strong plus.


What You’ll Gain

  • Opportunity to lead a mission-critical growth function in one of the fastest-growing online betting platforms in LATAM.
  • Direct influence over company growth, marketing innovation, and market expansion.
  • A collaborative, tech-savvy, and entrepreneurial work culture.
  • Competitive compensation + performance-based bonuses.
  • Autonomy, ownership, and room to innovate.

title: Country Manager
description:
T4Trade, a well establish broker in Europe, ASIA and LATAM is looking to hire an experienced individual to assume the role of Country Manager.


Job Description:

  • Lead and manage the local team, providing support and training in line with HQ requirements.
  • Oversee and grow the company's operations within the region (including, but not limited to Brazil).
  • Maintain and strengthen relationships with existing partners, ensuring the highest level of service is delivered in a timely manner.
  • Promote and drive the adoption of the company’s financial products and services.
  • Represent the company at international industry expos and be available for travel.
  • Leverage existing partner relationships to generate new business opportunities.
  • Stay up to date with global financial markets on a daily basis.
  • Adhere to company policies and procedures.
  • Provide regular feedback on progress to management.


Qualifications:

  • A diploma or university degree in Business Administration, Management, or a related field.
  • Previous experience in business development within the FX industry, including managing a portfolio and/or team.
  • Business fluency in English, Spanish, or Portuguese.
  • Proficient in Microsoft Word and Excel.
  • Strong verbal and written communication skills.
  • Self-motivated with the ability to generate and expand business independently.
  • Comfortable working in a high-pressure, fast-paced environment.


What We Offer:

  • Competitive base salary and performance-based commission structure
  • Opportunity to work with a dynamic, multicultural team in a fast-paced and exciting industry
  • Professional development and training to enhance your skills and knowledge
  • Comprehensive benefits package, including health coverage and retirement plans depending on location


Location: Option for Remote

Type: Full-Time


If you are a proactive and driven individual with a passion for the financial markets and a proven track record in business development, we invite you to join our team and contribute to our success in the LATAM market.

title: Trade Finance Professionals
description:
About the Role:

Euro Exim Bank, an award-winning global financial institution is seeking freelance-based professionals who are truly Passionate About Sales. Your main task is to attract new clients involved in international trade such as exporters and importers by offering them our trade finance services such as Letters of Credit, Standby Letters of Credit and Bank Guarantees necessary for them to trade successfully in the global market.


Freelance basis only (this is NOT a permanent position)

Commission-based pay only (this is NOT a fixed salaried position)

Working from home from your country of residence (this is NOT an office-based position)

There is NO investment or fee required from you.


Benefits:

Working in your own leisure time at your own pace where there are no targets.

Setting your own goals, and your success is only limited by your enthusiasm and dedication to winning deals and bringing sales.

Receiving full support from the Bank throughout the entire sales process including regular lead generation in Brazil .

Ability to bring own clients and contacts to earn higher commissions.

Expand your professional network

Ongoing delivery of high-quality training and trade finance product knowledge


Commission:

All members of our global sales team are given a commission scheme ranging from 6.5% to 15% on successful transaction volumes (terms & conditions apply). Your commission earnings will increase with your performance growth.


Requirements:

· 1+ years of experience in financial consultation, corporate advisory, corporate and institutional banking, business banking, or any related/similar sector

· An understanding of KYC, AML, and PEPs is advantageous

· A mobile phone, a PC with internal or external webcam capability and reliable internet


About Euro Exim Bank:

Headquartered in St. Lucia, West Indies, Euro Exim Bank is an award-winning international trade finance institution providing trade solutions for importers, contractors, and exporters. We have a Class ‘A’ international banking license from the Financial Services Regulatory Authority of St. Lucia (FSRA), a proud member of the Caribbean Association of Banks (CAB) and the International Chamber of Commerce (ICC).


The successful candidate will take initiative and be a self-starter and enjoy being part of a dynamic team. This role would ideally suit a diligent and reliable individual who is a team player with well-developed interpersonal skills.

title: Senior Full Stack UI Developer – Angular, TypeScript & API Expert
description:
Job Title: Senior Full Stack UI Developer – Angular, TypeScript & API Expert

Position Type: Full-Time Contract (40hrs/week)

Contract Duration: Long Term

Work Hours: Central Time Zone (CST)

Work Schedule: 8 hours/day (Mon-Fri)

Location: 100% Remote (Candidates can from from anywhere in LATAM Countries)

Overview

We're seeking a Senior Full Stack Developer to join our client's RealTime team. This role is ideal for someone passionate about real-time web applications, data visualization, and working in a distributed team environment. You will contribute to the development of cloud-based, real-time applications that display fracking job data and global site visualizations.

This position emphasizes Angular and TypeScript for the front end, with supporting backend development using .NET 6.0/C# and microservices architecture. Familiarity with real-time processing , Plotly charts , and messaging protocols (MQTT, RabbitMQ, SignalR) is highly desirable.

Key Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, and maintain responsive web applications using Angular and TypeScript
  • Write microservices and APIs using .NET 6.0 and C#
  • Integrate and troubleshoot messaging platforms such as MQTT , RabbitMQ , and Azure Service Bus
  • Work with MongoDB and manage JSON data models
  • Develop and visualize data using Plotly.js charts
  • Use Protobuf and SignalR/WebSockets for real-time communication
  • Write unit tests and participate in Agile/Scrum ceremonies
  • Collaborate across onshore and offshore teams , with daily Scrum meetings at 9 AM CST
  • Use Git and Azure DevOps for version control, CI/CD, and task tracking
  • Assist teammates and participate in code reviews and process improvement

Qualifications

  • 5+ years of experience in full stack development
  • Strong frontend experience with Angular, TypeScript, Plotly (70% frontend)
  • Solid backend skills with .NET 5.0 or 6.0 , C# , microservices, and APIs
  • Hands-on experience with real-time systems , SignalR , MQTT , or RabbitMQ
  • Familiarity with MongoDB or other non-relational databases
  • Strong skills working with JSON , Protobuf , and cloud-based real-time data
  • Experience in Agile/Scrum development environments
  • Strong communication skills; ability to work with distributed teams
  • Able to work independently and take initiative

Nice to Have

  • Experience with real-time geo-location data
  • Background in energy, fracking, or industrial data monitoring
  • Understanding of cloud data ingestion and real-time analytics
  • Experience working across time zones and multicultural teams

title: Implementation Consultant
description:
Wenham Carter is supporting a top Verdantix-rated global EHS & Sustainability SaaS vendor. They are relied on by more than 3.5 million users worldwide, including at FedEx, Virgin Atlantic & ASML.


For the past 30 years, they've been a global leader in software solutions for Environment, Health, Safety and Quality programs. Their scalable SaaS solutions provides clients with unprecedented flexibility in managing, tracking and reporting on essential corporate information. Their friendly, knowledgeable staff ensures their almost 1400 clients across the globe get the most out of their groundbreaking, user-friendly software solutions.


In the role, you will be a trusted advisor across the entire implementation project lifecycle from initial workshops to the final go-live. You will deliver cutting-edge solutions to both new and existing mid-market and enterprise customers, handling projects with varying scope and complexity. Collaborating with customers across all industries, you will lead efforts to configure requirements, train users and support the final go-live.

• Hands-on experience with XML/HTML or similar to configure SaaS software for clients


Desirable experience:

• Background in EHS SaaS

title: SAP Concur Functional Consultant
description:
Job Description

Immediate opportunity for an experienced, forward-thinking Senior Concur Functional Consultant with a passion for growth and business transformation. Join our team and work on challenging, complex solutions that are driving innovation and technology advancement. Our clients are some of the world’s leading companies and the candidate will be a part of challenging projects to build and support technical solutions for their needs.necessidades. Fluent English Mandatory


Duties and Responsibilities:

  • Responsible for Setup and help maintain client Concur environment throughout the lifecycle of an implementation (Configuration, Test/Development, Production)
  • Utilize industry best practices, techniques, and standards throughout entire project execution
  • Provide Leadership and Guidance on systems integration plan
  • Lead client in design of AP Invoice Automation solution and configuring client imports of Purchase Requests, Vendor Data, Purchase Orders, and Receipt of Goods
  • Lead Data Mapping exercises between client ERP and SAP Concur using industry best practices
  • Configure client requirements within the Concur system.
  • Integrate client personnel data into Concur and ERP vendor master records
  • Support client testing cycles, research complex customer problems, issues, and circumstances and provide recommendations, alternatives and risk assessments to project team
  • Communicate "best practice" recommendations based on prior experiences
  • Responsible for the migration of software configurations between production and test environments
  • Ensure completion of deliverables, managing schedules, meeting milestones, and ensuring technical integration success
  • Assist in developing and maintaining an internal technical product knowledge base


Minimum Qualifications/Experience:

  • Minimum 5+ years' relevant SAP Concur Invoice implementation experience; experience with other Concur Platforms such as Travel, Request, and Expense a plus
  • Minimum 3+ years’ experience working as a consultant in client facing software implementation roles
  • Demonstrated ability to work directly with client to adopt industry and product best practices
  • Experience with multiple concurrent Concur Implementations
  • Hands-on functional configuration and design experience
  • Prior work experience in Accounting and/or Accounts Payable; knowledge of business processes around account settlement, clearing accounts, month end close, etc.
  • Understanding of Concur integration to ERP Finance systems (SAP, Oracle, PeopleSoft, etc.) required
  • Participation in all phases of at least 2 full-lifecycle SAP Concur implementations
  • Experience in data integration
  • Experience with ERP HR systems as it relates to Concur Integrations
  • Experience in developing system test cases and guiding clients through the steps of User Acceptance Testing
  • Experience with Concur Training Material development/delivery preferred
  • Experience working with major credit card providers data


Minimum Education:

  • Bachelor’s Degree


Required Certifications:

  • SAP or Concur certifications preferred
  • Agile certifications preferred


Other:

  • Fluent English Mandatory
  • Spanish plus

title: UX Designer Sênior - Logística
description:
Somos da Logística do Luizalabs, desenvolvemos produtos digitais para gerenciamento e operação de coleta, estoque e distribuição das entregas mais rápidas do Brasil.


Sim! Temos a cultura de desenvolver a tecnologia de todos os nossos produtos e gostamos do desafio de trabalhar em larga escala, cuidando para que os clientes e os parceiros tenham uma experiência excepcional conosco.


Nosso propósito é digitalizar empreendedores brasileiros, além de promover a inclusão de pessoas no sistema logístico através das nossas plataformas.


Estamos procurando alguém que saiba lidar com desafios diários e com capacidade de trabalhar em equipe. Que some ao time, faça as coisas acontecerem e esteja preparado para as mudanças tecnológicas constantes e demandas próprias e desafiadoras.


Queremos construir produtos cada vez melhores - inovadores, rentáveis, escaláveis e com os quais as pessoas adoram trabalhar. Buscamos oferecer o melhor com o que temos. Gostamos de pessoas e nos ajudamos mutuamente. Se você é apaixonado(a) pelo o que faz, estuda sempre, inspira talentos e trabalha em equipe, essa vaga é para você!


O que você vai fazer por aqui


Como UX Designer Sênior, você vai liderar a concepção e implementação de projetos de design com o objetivo de elevar as experiências dos usuários em nossos produtos logísticos.

Será responsável por desenvolver interfaces de usuário complexas e coordenar com equipes multifuncionais para assegurar que todos os aspectos do design sejam consistentes e de alta qualidade.

Você é um designer experiente que compreende seu papel estratégico no desenvolvimento de produtos e terá um papel crucial na orientação de designers juniores e nos processos do nosso time.


O que esperamos de você


  • Liderança em projetos de design: Definir e executar soluções de experiência do usuário do conceito inicial até a entrega final ao usuário, trabalhando em estreita colaboração com o time de produtos e engenharia;
  • Mão na massa: Desenvolver wireframes, storyboards, fluxos de usuário, mapas de sites, interfaces sofisticadas e detalhadas para garantir alta coesão visual e consistência na jornada do usuário;
  • Pesquisa e dados: Experiência em aplicar pesquisas e testes com usuários, analisar e usar dados para tomar decisões de design;
  • Visão estratégica: Antecipar tendências de design e tecnologia, contribuindo para a visão estratégica do produto e propondo inovações que podem ser incorporadas em projetos futuros;
  • Pensamento sistêmico: Avaliar o impacto das decisões de design na escalabilidade e manutenção dos produtos, garantindo que as soluções de design sejam tecnicamente viáveis e sustentáveis a longo prazo;
  • Trabalho colaborativo: Excelentes habilidades de comunicação e trabalho em equipe em ambientes dinâmicos;
  • Aprendizado contínuo: Incentivar a experimentação e a iteração rápida, promovendo uma cultura de teste e aprendizado dentro da equipe de design;
  • Influência: Orientar e mentorar designers de nível júnior e pleno, promovendo o desenvolvimento de suas habilidades e conhecimentos em design;
  • Proatividade: Organização para priorizar e gerenciar múltiplos projetos em um cenário de constantes mudanças;
  • Conhecimento técnico: Contribuir para a melhoria contínua dos processos e melhores práticas dentro da equipe.


Requisitos:


  • Experiência em design de produtos;
  • Repertório em produtos B2B para web e mobile nativo;
  • Comprovada habilidade em escalar produtos;
  • Habilidade de vestir chapéu de Product Owner e pensar produtos através da ótica do impacto nos negócios;
  • Ampla experiência trabalhando com produtos para web e mobile nativo;
  • Conhecimento avançado em ferramentas como Figma, Hotjar e Google Analytics.


Como é o ambiente de trabalho?

No Luizalabs, temos grande autonomia e responsabilidade, somos multidisciplinares, auto gerenciáveis e com pouca burocracia no nosso cotidiano. Buscamos romper as barreiras que diminuem nossa capacidade de agregar valor ao negócio. Fazemos entregas frequentes e agimos rapidamente ao encontrar problemas; nosso ritmo é acelerado, mas temos tranquilidade e equilíbrio para planejar e executar nossas tarefas com qualidade.

title: Desenvolvedor React Pleno
description:
Sua próxima oportunidade está a caminho!


A VILT é uma empresa de TI, onde valorizamos nosso pessoal, promovemos o trabalho em equipe e, é claro, o bom humor.

Dê uma olhada nesta oportunidade de emprego e veja se você é o próximo VILTian! (se você conhece alguém, não se esqueça de recomendá-lo)


Procuramos um Desenvolvedor React Pleno que seja apaixonado por tecnologia, comprometido com a entrega de soluções de alta qualidade, atento aos detalhes e motivado por desafios. Que tenha um perfil colaborativo, proativo, organizado, com boa capacidade de análise e que se sinta confortável atuando em ambientes dinâmicos, contribuindo para a construção de aplicações performáticas, escaláveis e com excelente experiência para o usuário.


O que você irá fazer:

  • Desenvolver e manter aplicações web com foco em React e Next.js;
  • Colaborar com equipes de produto, design e backend para entregar soluções completas;
  • Garantir a performance, responsividade e acessibilidade das interfaces;
  • Escrever código limpo, reutilizável e com testes;
  • Participar de code reviews e contribuir para a evolução técnica do time.


O que esperamos de você:

  • De 3 a 4 anos de experiência com desenvolvimento Front-End;
  • Domínio em React.js e Next.js;
  • Forte conhecimento em JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5 e CSS3 (SASS, Styled Components, etc.);
  • Experiência com controle de versão (Git);
  • Noções de SSR (Server Side Rendering) e SSG (Static Site Generation);
  • Conhecimento em consumo de APIs REST e/ou GraphQL;
  • Experiência com bibliotecas de gerenciamento de estado (ex: Redux, Zustand, Jotai, etc.);
  • Boas práticas de SEO para aplicações em Next.js;
  • Familiaridade com testes (unitários e de integração).


Diferenciais:

  • Experiência com CI/CD;
  • Conhecimento em TypeScript;
  • Experiência com ferramentas de monitoramento e análise de performance (ex: Lighthouse, Sentry);
  • Familiaridade com metodologias ágeis (Scrum/Kanban).


Informações adicionais:

  • Modelo de contrato CLT.


Se você estiver pronto para levar sua carreira de desenvolvedor para o próximo nível, adoraríamos conhecê-lo!

title: Senior SAP Consultant
description:
Buscamos um Consultor SAP BTP Sênior para integrar um projeto estratégico de transformação digital no setor de varejo.


Responsabilidades:

  • Projetar e implementar soluções na SAP Business Technology Platform (SAP BTP) .
  • Trabalhar com serviços como SAP Integration Suite, SAP Extension Suite , SAP Build , SAP Business Application Studio , entre outros.
  • Desenvolvimento de integrações entre SAP S/4HANA Cloud, sistemas legados e aplicativos de terceiros.
  • Criação de extensões (side-by-side extensions) para o SAP S/4HANA Cloud usando serviços BTP.
  • Apoiar a configuração de workflows , automação de processos e gestão de APIs .
  • Conduzir workshops técnicos e treinar usuários-chave sobre as funcionalidades da SAP BTP.


Requisitos:

  • Experiência mínima de 5 anos em projetos SAP, sendo pelo menos 2 anos específicos em SAP BTP .
  • Forte conhecimento em desenvolvimento de integrações via SAP Integration Suite e APIs REST/SOAP.
  • Experiência com desenvolvimento de extensões Fiori/UI5 em ambiente SAP BTP.
  • Conhecimento em autenticação e autorização na BTP (XSUAA, OAuth).
  • Experiência prática com serviços de automação como SAP Build Process Automation ou SAP Workflow Management .


Localização: Brasil (preferencialmente em São Paulo)

Modalidade: Flexível

Tipo de projeto: Migração

Idioma requerido: Português (fluente), outros idiomas serão um diferencial


Interessados enviar e-mail para com sua taxa (rate) ou aplicar diretamente .

title: Dealer development manager Central & South America
description: Home-based (anywhere in Central or South America) | International scope |

title: Technical Support Engineer
description:
Join the Traefik Labs Support Team and Make a Difference!

Are you passionate about solving technical challenges and delivering exceptional customer experiences? Traefik Labs, a leading API Gateway and API Management solutions provider, is seeking to grow its team with talented Support Engineers.


What You'll Need:

  • Technical Proficiency: Strong understanding of container technologies (Kubernetes, Docker ) and cloud environments. Networking experience is a must-have.
  • Problem-Solving Skills: A knack for troubleshooting and a dedication to finding solutions.
  • Communication Skills: Excellent English written and verbal communication skills to effectively interact with customers and team members.
  • Teamwork: A collaborative spirit and the ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, global team.
  • Time Zone: GMT -5 to GMT -2


What You'll Do:

  • Customer Champion: You’re the first line of defense for our customers. You handle support tickets and provide timely, effective solutions.
  • Technical Problem Solver: Dive deep into complex issues, and work closely with our engineering team to reproduce and resolve problems.
  • Product Innovator: Collaborate with our sales, solution architecture, and field engineering teams to understand customer needs and identify opportunities for product improvement.
  • Knowledge Sharing: Contribute to our vibrant community by writing technical blog posts, creating documentation, and sharing your expertise.


Why Join Traefik Labs?

  • Cutting-Edge Technology: Work with the latest API gateway and API management technologies.
  • Global Impact: Contribute to a product used by organizations worldwide.
  • Career Growth: Opportunities to advance your technical skills and career within a dynamic company.
  • Collaborative Culture: Join a supportive and passionate team that values innovation and teamwork. 
  • Open Source Pioneer: Our flagship Open Source Ingress Controller traefik boasts over 3.5 Billion downloads and global usage. It has become an industry standard.

title: QA (Quality Assurance) analyst #964788
description:
A Dexian, lançada em 2023, tem presença global e traz consigo quase 30 anos de experiência através de suas companhias legadas, principalmente da combinação da DISYS e Signature Consultants.

Iniciamos no Brasil 2007 como DISYS e, de lá para cá, conquistamos mais de 60 clientes de diferentes setores da economia. Como Dexian, passamos a ser uma das maiores empresas de soluções de staffing, soluções de TI e complementação de força de trabalho. Estamos liderando a indústria por meio de entrega de serviços exclusivos que combina escala global, projetos de serviço completo e agilidade tática para modernizar modelos de contratação. Apoiamos nossos clientes para encontrar a melhor maneira que seu gap de talentos seja endereçado, de maneira a suportar seu processo de transformação digital. Contamos com escritórios estrategicamente localizados em quatro grandes capitais: Curitiba (PR), Porto Alegre (RS), Rio de Janeiro (RJ) e São Paulo (SP). Assim, conseguimos nos manter próximos dos nossos clientes e consultores. Também somos uma Minority Owner Company e nos sentimos orgulhosos de termos nascido na diversidade.


O que esperar de nós

Pessoas estão no centro de nossa estratégia e compõem o nosso maior capital. Temos compromisso de atrair, reter os melhores talentos e construir conexões reais para a vida. Por isso, atuamos como ponte entre profissionais altamente qualificados e oportunidades consistentes e prósperas. Acreditamos que, trazer o talento, a tecnologia e as organizações certas juntos, ajuda a desbloquear resultados transformadores e alcançar novos níveis de sucessos para os clientes que atendemos e os consultores que contratamos. E para isso, cinco valores fundamentais nos guiam: Integridade, Transparência, Autenticidade, Engenhosidade e Empatia. A Dexian está comprometida com a responsabilidade social corporativa e, investe em programas que apoiam a diversidade e inclusão.


Se você compartilha dos mesmos valores, aqui é seu lugar!


Nosso Cliente:

Esta vaga irá atender nosso cliente, uma grande multinacional no segmento de petróleo e gás.



Perfil Profissional – QA/Test Analyst


Formação Acadêmica:

  • Graduação em Ciência da Computação , Tecnologia da Informação , Engenharia ou áreas correlatas.
  • Inglês fluente, com capacidade de comunicação em ambientes globais.


Soft Skills:

  • Priorização: Habilidade em identificar tarefas críticas, otimizando o tempo e os recursos para alcançar resultados com eficiência.
  • Adaptabilidade: Flexibilidade para se ajustar rapidamente a mudanças em requisitos, escopo e tecnologias.
  • Comunicação: Excelente comunicação verbal e escrita, com facilidade para interagir com equipes técnicas, áreas de negócio e stakeholders de diferentes níveis.
  • Diversidade: Capacidade de colaborar com pessoas de diferentes culturas e localizações, promovendo um ambiente de trabalho inclusivo e global.


Habilidades Técnicas:

  • Desenvolvimento e manutenção de planos de teste e cenários de validação.
  • Experiência com ferramentas de automação de testes , como Tosca e Selenium .
  • Execução de testes unitários , regressão , performance e stress .
  • Conhecimento em APIs e testes de integração.
  • Conhecimentos básicos em:
  • C#
  • SQL
  • Cloud (AWS)
  • GitHub
  • Vivência em metodologias ágeis (Agile) e trabalho colaborativo em squads.
  • Experiência com testes de aplicações mobile .

title: VAGA FREELANCE – BACK-END (PostGIS + API)
description:
Projeto de Startup | Confidencial | Remoto

Estamos montando o time técnico de uma startup em fase inicial , com validação feita e MVP já estruturado. Procuramos apenas desenvolvedores com domínio real da stack exigida .

Se você não domina os requisitos abaixo, pedimos que não se candidate.

title: Editor
description:
Posição para Pessoa Editora PL - Matemática


Responsabilidades e atribuições:


• Editar obras das Editoras Ática, Saraiva e Scipione na área de Matemática para o atendimento de editais de venda pública nos diversos segmentos da Educação Básica (Ensino Fundamental I, Ensino Fundamental II e Ensino Médio), verificando a correção, a atualização e a qualidade dos conteúdos da área, a clareza do texto, a adequação das ilustrações e das atividades, bem como reduzindo erros e retrabalhos.

• Dar suporte ao Editor responsável durante toda a produção.

• Elaborar, quando necessário, conteúdos, atividades e seções para o Livro do Estudante, além de orientações didáticas para o Manual do Professor.

• Elaborar ou orientar a elaboração de pautas de imagem, cartografia, ilustração, entre outros pedidos.

• Liberar provas de mapas, gráficos e ilustrações, selecionar e aprovar imagens de acordo com a orientação autoral e as regras estabelecidas pelos Editais do PNLD.

• Acompanhar a execução de tarefas feitas por editores freelancers.

• Liberar e acompanhar a liberação de provas com o controle de pendências de iconografia, cartografia, ilustração e textos de terceiros.

• Assegurar o cumprimento do projeto gráfico proposta para a obra, os prazos e a qualidade diferenciada.

• Apoiar integralmente os fechamentos de todos os produtos da área.


Requisitos e qualificações:


• Formação em Matemática (bacharel ou licenciatura).

• Profissional atualizado em relação aos conhecimentos de sua área de formação e de atuação;

• Importante ter conhecimento de documentos relacionados ao sistema educacional brasileiro, como BNCC, Editais de programas anteriores, pesquisas recentes nas áreas de Matemática e de educação;

Experiência no PNLD;

• Conhecimento das ferramentas Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint);

• Conhecimento das ferramentas ADOBE e Acrobat Pro;

• Conhecimento de software de edição de Matemática (Mathtype e Equation).



Benefícios:


O que você pode esperar da gente?


  • Participação nos lucros: resultados com comemoração fazem parte do jeito Cogna.
  • Vale-refeição ou alimentação: num cartão de benefícios flexível.
  • Assistência médica: um abrangente plano de saúde, com inclusão de dependentes e coparticipação.
  • Assistência odontológica: está disponível para manter seu sorriso.


Mas espera, ainda tem mais!


  • Bolsas de estudo de graduação e pós graduação: nossas unidades de ensino para que você e seus dependentes (cônjuge e filhos).
  • Day off no aniversário: você poderá escolher um dia para relaxar e celebrar.
  • Convênio SESC: abre as portas para as inúmeras oportunidades de melhora na qualidade de vida.
  • Convênio farmácia Univers: descontos numa variedade de medicamentos.
  • Universidade corporativa: diversas trilhas e cursos gratuitos na nossa universidade corporativa para você seguir evoluindo com a gente.
  • Descontos em livros: para você adquirir os melhores títulos em nossas editoras.
  • Wellhub (Gympass): para que você possa se movimentar no seu dia a dia.
  • Programa Ninho: Um programa dedicado às nossas famílias que estão aguardando um novo bebê.
  • Valoriza - Programa de Recrutamento Interno: Para impulsionar sua carreira por meio de oportunidades internas.



Aqui, acreditamos no respeito, na diversidade e na busca da inclusão em todas suas frentes. Todos os candidatos qualificados serão considerados independentemente de raça, gênero, identidade, expressão de gênero, orientação sexual, nacionalidade, genética, deficiência ou de qualquer outra base.

Nosso propósito é avançar cada vez mais, gerando empregabilidade para talentos diversos. Venha enriquecer nosso time!

title: WordPress Full-Stack Developer
description:
Pixels-360 is seeking an experienced WordPress developer to join our Engineering team. This position requires strong technical expertise in WordPress development, excellent attention to details, great communication skills, and a collaborative mindset. The successful candidate will assist with the coding, testing, and support of our clients' WordPress-based websites and web application projects.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop, maintain and optimize high-performing WordPress websites and web applications
  • Implement responsive designs and ensure cross-browser/device compatibility
  • Participate in code reviews and maintain high code quality standards
  • Collaborate with international team members across different time zones
  • Document technical specifications and maintain development documentation
  • Participate in stand-ups, project, and design hand-over meetings
  • Contribute to team knowledge sharing and continuous improvement


Required Qualifications:

  • 4+ years of professional experience in WordPress development
  • Proficient in PHP, MySQL, and WordPress theme/plugin development
  • Solid understanding of HTML5, CSS/SASS, JavaScript and responsive web design
  • Proven experience with Git workflow and CI/CD processes
  • Strong attention to details
  • Familiarity with enterprise hosting platforms (AWS, Pantheon, etc.)
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English


Preferred Skills:

  • Strong expertise in modern JavaScript frameworks (Angular, React, or similar)
  • Knowledge of performance optimization and security best practices
  • Ability to multi-task and manage several projects simultaneously
  • Experience in a remote work environment with distributed teams

title: Consultor SAP MM
description:
Sobre nós

A Atos é uma líder global em transformação digital, com cerca de 94.000 colaboradores e uma receita anual de aproximadamente €11 bilhões de euros. Número um na Europa em cibersegurança, nuvem e computação de alto desempenho, o Grupo oferece soluções personalizadas de ponta a ponta para todos os setores em 69 países. Pioneira em serviços e produtos de descarbonização, a Atos está comprometida com um ambiente digital seguro e descarbonizado para seus clientes. A Atos é uma SE (Societas Europaea) e está listada na Euronext Paris.


------


Requisitos:

  • Experiencia com ambiente customizados (transações Z´s) e complexos
  • Idiomas Inglês (preferencia) e Espanhol é um plus.
  • Desejável conhecimento em debug.


Requisitos Técnicos:

  • Criação e/ou Modificação de Depósitos, Grupos de Mercadorias, Criação de Múltiplos Perfis de Arredondamento de MRP, Conversão de Unidades de Medidas, Validação do Contas Razão, Configuração de Movimentos
  • Calculo, Integração com Fornecedores, Automatização: Processo de Recebimento de Mercadoria, Logística e Importação, NFE´s, MIGO/MIRO, Pricing, material configurável MTO (Make to Order), SPED, J1BTAX, Leis Fiscais e IVA´s
  • Processos de Compra, Inventario, Movimentação de Mercadoria, OBYC, Estratégia de Liberação. Desejável
  • Conhecimento básico em EWM: Configuração e Criação de Depósitos (WMAR e WMPE), Configuração por tipo de deposito, atrelando as atividades, sequenciamento, controles, processos de entrada.
  • Recebimento de Mercadoria e Expedição, Processo de Entrada e Saida de Mercadorias, Depósito Interno.
  • Sistema de Fluxo de Materiais (SFM), Picking, Armazenamento



-----

Aviso de Diversidade

Entendemos a diversidade como um fator valioso. Todas as nossas oportunidades são Afirmativas para Pessoas com Deficiência.

Valorizamos a diversidade independentemente de identidade ou expressão de gênero, orientação sexual, religião, etnia, idade, deficiência, nacionalidade ou qualquer outro aspecto.


Aviso de Proteção de Dados

Os dados pessoais coletados serão utilizados exclusivamente para o processo seletivo e tratados conforme os níveis de segurança adotados pela Atos.

Caso haja alguma dúvida relacionada à proteção de dados ou qualquer aspecto envolvendo o tratamento realizado, você pode entrar em contato por meio do canal:

title: Arquiteto Java
description:
Há mais de 20 anos mercado, somos uma consultoria estratégica de Inovação e Transformação Digital. Nossa especialidade é impulsionar as demandas de nossos clientes, integrando processos, pessoas e tecnologia de alta performance.
